Throwables 2.0.0 API

Contains classes and interfaces that are useful for dealing with Throwables.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.edugility.throwables Provides classes and interfaces useful for working with Throwables.

 

Contains classes and interfaces that are useful for dealing with Throwables.

See ThrowableList for a class that assists with reading a Throwable's causal chain.

See ThrowableChain for a class that helps with capturing all Throwables thrown, even in the case of nested try/catch/finally blocks.

Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
ThrowableChain, ThrowableList
